frontmatter.title: Build and scale your Mobile apps - Services
frontmatter.description: Build and scale your mobile apps with native iOS and Android development. Expert team delivering high-quality mobile solutions.

form-options.title: Let’s build your next Mobile app

select-fields.label: What do you want to build?
select-fields.name: application

options.label: Simple app (Up to $25,000)
options.description: Often list or table-based, an app with 3-4 screens and one primary function. It displays a relatively simple collection of information and doesn’t store any data.

options.label: Database-dependent / dynamic apps (Up to $100,000)
options.description: Complex app that stores data on the user’s device or a remote server. It may require users to register, allow them to find, input, and display data, sync data between multiple devices, connect to remote online web services, etc.

options.label: Multi-functional / Enterprise or Brand apps (More than $100,000)
options.description: Includes a number of core features and custom user interface assist with a business activity. Such apps usually require the use of extensive databases, advanced UI, and commerce integration.

404.description: Trying to look for a hidden gem?

site.title: Dwarves Foundation - We build software with Go, React, K8s, Swift and Flutter
site.description: A software development firm based in Asia. Helping tech startups, entrepreneurs and makers build world-class products since 2013.
